item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: HOME
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded:
SERVICES

Recording

From full album projects to a quick voice over, we have the tools to deliver a professional product.

Mixing

Our combination of analog and digital equipment ensures a top quality sound every time.

Mastering

Let us take your final mix to radio ready with our professional mastering services.

THE STUDIO

 
Legacy Sound is a professional recording studio featuring the best of both vintage analog and modern digital tools. Music is our passion and we focus on making a big sound in an intimate setting.
The center piece of our 400 SF control room is an SSL 6056 E series console fitted with 48 channels mic preamplifiers, equalizers, and compressors, as well as an extensive patch-bay and routing capabilities. Our monitoring system features Swiss made PSI A25M monitors as well as a pair of classic Yamaha NS-10s. In addition, we have a 3 bay producers rack filled with top notch mic preamps, compressors, equalizers, and effects processors.
Our recording spaces include a 425 SF live room with 12' ceiling that is great for recording drums, piano, solo instruments or ensembles. The 125 SF iso room doubles as an escape for additional writing sessions or a more intimate space for capturing a vocal or acoustic guitar.
Control Room
Live Room
Production/Recording Booth

 

OUR EQUIPMENT

Recorders
Mixers
Microphones
Outboard Gear
Monitoring
Instruments

BOOK A SESSION

Ready to book a session? Please fill out the contact form to discuss your project.

CONTACT US

item.title: Music Production
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded: We can assist you with as little or as much as you need to make your songs a reality. We have session musicians available to help complete your project.

item.title: Recording
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded: Capturing your performance is the most import part of the process. We make sure we get the best takes we can using professional equipment to ensure an amazing product in the end. We don't believe in "fixing it in the mix".

item.title: Mixing
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded: From full blown editing and tuning your tracks, to a simple in the box mix, we can deliver it all. Let us know what your looking for and we'll provide you with the best Analog and Digital have to offer.

item.title: Mastering
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded: We can master a stereo final mix or multiple stems to allow for greater flexibility. Whether it's a single, or an entire album, we're happy to master your project. Let us know your projects details and we will gladly provide you with a quote.

item.title: Remote Drum Tracking / Live
item.dc:creator: legacyadmin
item.content:encoded:
With our online drum tracking service, you will be in the session and oversee the production of your drum tracks via the internet. You will have direct communication with the session drummer and be able to see and hear (high quality) in real time, to ensure you get the sound your after the first time around.  Pricing as low as $99 per track!  

(High Speed Internet connection required for accessibility.  Some latency may be experienced.)
